description:
When I try to open a ppt, pptx file, Its not showing anythig not actually any error. I many times double click on that files but no response is comming. I also try to open the WPS Presentation software also but it also not open.

Except WPS Presentation no problems happens with other software.
summary: Any presentation file is not open

description:
I've installed the v10.1.0.5707 on Fedora 26 and some other distros. When tried to launch the app, it just flashes and gone. When looked at the command line status, it's written "/opt/kingsoft/wps-office/office6/wpp: error while loading shared libraries: libbz2.so.1.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory". My solution to it was by invoking the command below in Terminal.

sudo ln -s /lib64/libbz2.so.1 /lib64/libbz2.so.1.0
Any ppt file is not opening up. the wps presentation is only not responding and is not prompting any error. please fix it up with a quick update. Thanks.

While it might be my system (as to why it wasn't working), it should at least give some sort of indication or shutdown message when it breaks. If I try to click on settings, try to open an application in the main app, or try to launch it from a component then it just shuts down without any indication of what's wrong.
summary: Doesn't work and no error message

description: I use it, it's OK and I really appreciate that the developers have released it as a free version, but I do miss some features, especially the slide templates and ready-to-go styles that PowerPoint has.
The video inserted will be cut few seconds automatically in the wps presentation, system: ubuntu 18.04
真的很良心了，日常够用的了，推荐
